text: Bak Adam Neuyue uleh Hadharat Na bandum alat tacuba peugah Adam peugah le bandum lat batat Dum malaikat ka teuhah babah Teuma kheun Tuhan bak malaikat Nyan ka talihat lagee Lon peugah Lon keuh nyang teupue bandum lat batat Bumoe ngon langet bak Lon cit mudah Bah le di gata han deuh talihat Lon teupue cit that hana meuilah Got tapeulahe got tasom meuhat Di Lon Lonlihat Lonteupue sudah
